dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. Includes insets: Canea -- Spina Longa -- Retimo -- Thine -- Suda -- Candia. From: Atlas sive descriptio terrarum orbis ... / Frederik de Wit. Amsterdam : Frederik de Wit, [ca. 1680]. Date of publication from Zacharakis.
dct_publisher_sm: [Amsterdam] : Gedruckt tot Amsterdam by Frederick de Wit inde Kalverstraet inde Witte Paskaert, [ca.1680].
